_sText:
Another map for the glow series, was slightly motivated to make a map so threw something together in a 2-3 days, then had some motivation help from Benchmarked to finish it up. Also a huge thanks to Asko, mad, ahmisa and promises for testing the map.

I wanted to do some 3D skybox stuff in the open skybox area but ive been lacking a lot of motivation to map at all and was just a bit meh to finish it after starting the map, so i just cba. 

Hope you enjoy the map and an extra thanks to asko for giving me this video of his segmented run during testing.
